pkgmetadata.longdescription: # colab-xtermColab-xterm allows you to open a terminal in a cell.# Usage1. Install package and load the extension ``` !pip install colab-xterm %load_ext colabxterm ```2. Open a terminal ``` %xterm ```3. Enjoy!Try it out in the demo notebook. [![Open In Colab](https://colab.research.google.com/assets/colab-badge.svg)](https://colab.research.google.com/github/infuseai/colab-xterm/blob/main/demo.ipynb)# Features- TTY support- Does not block your kernel# Options```%xterm height=1000 port=10001```option | description-------|-----------height | The height of the terminal panelport | The server port# Screenshots![](assets/colab-xterm.png)
